DOC.criteria: This study involve two group human subject : patient staff participate Planned Parenthood ( PP ) clinic United States . Patient participant young woman receive contraceptive counseling Planned Parenthood clinic staff participant clinicians health educator serve woman . Patients must : Female ; Age 1825 ; Fluent English Spanish ; Not want become pregnant next 12 month ; Sexually active past 3 month ; At risk pregnancy ; Received contraceptive counsel ; Not pregnant ; Willing contact telephone next 12 month . Clinic staff must : Employed participate PP clinic ; Offer clinical care , counsel education abortion contraception clinic . ( This may include physician , advance practice clinician , nurse , social worker health educator . ) For clinic eligible study site , must : Not share staff Have active LARC intervention ongoing Have > 400 clients/year
